# Set up
```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(pmplots)
library(dplyr)

data <- pmplots_data_obs()
```

# NPDE versus time
```{r}
npde_time(data)

npde_tad(data)
```



# NPDE versus PRED

```{r}
npde_pred(data)
```


# NPDE histogram
```{r}
npde_hist(data)
```

# NPDE QQ plot
```{r}
npde_q(data)
```

# NPDE versus categorical variable

```{r}
cont_cat(data, x = "STUDYc", y = "NPDE") + pm_hline()
```

# NPDE versus continuous variables

```{r}
cont_cont(data, x= "WT//Weight (kg)", y = "NPDE") + 
  pm_hline() + pm_smooth()
```
